## Description

Implement OAuth2 authentication flow for user login.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] User can login with GitHub OAuth
- [ ] Session tokens are securely stored
- [ ] Logout functionality works correctly

## Notes

This story depends on US-002 (OAuth provider setup).
